description:
Episode 2: With Skin Diamond's arms bound behind her, Gia DiMarco wants to make her squirm and squeal like a pig! Though it looks like Gia's using the oldies but goodies on Skin when it comes to lesbian bondage, such as ropes and nipple clamps, she'll use all the electro BDSM tricks she has up her sleeves!
Skin squeals from Gia's liberal use of the zapper. But that's not the most delicious detail of Gia's diabolical electrosex machinations. Gia connects the sticky pads on Skin's butt and the acrylic plug in her pussy to a voice-activated box. The more Skin screams, the bigger the shock and it all gives Gia that much more of an incentive to push her over the edge!
title: The Electrosex Quiet Game
